snippet.title: Clone Drone in the Hyperdome | Building the Hyperdome | Meta Quest Platform
snippet.description:
Clone Drone in the Hyperdome is our VR successor to Clone Drone in the Danger Zone! Erik Rydeman explains how we approached building a new game with the same fun voxel destruction mechanics and robot gladiators. Erik talks about how we wanted sword combat to feel so that you have a fun and challenging experience.

Pre-Order Clone Drone in the Hyperdome now on the Meta Store: https://metaque.st/48PQw2z

Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@doborog
